i also love to travel.
i owe two laptops.
My mother's bedtime stories helped to develop my love of reading.
I am happily married to a retired engineer who enjoys spending time with our cats and traveling.

participant_2.background:
I made my mom a dress for her birthday and she loved it!
i m insecure.
I hide things from my family to protect them.
I read up on the history of my city in preparation for a visit from my best friend.
i do not have a lot of friends.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to make clothes. I made my mom a dress for her birthday and she loved it!
That's great! I'm not so creative, but I do enjoy reading.
I like to read too! I read up on the history of my city in preparation for a visit from my best friend.
That's a great idea! I love to learn about new things.
I do too. I'm always looking for ways to expand my knowledge.
I can relate to that. I love to travel and see new places.
I wish I could travel more. I'm not very good at it.
It's definitely not for everyone. I enjoy the experience of learning about new cultures and seeing new things.
I'm more of a homebody. I like to stay close to my family and friends.
I understand that. There's something to be said for being close to the people you love.
I'm glad you understand. It can be difficult to explain to people why I don't want to travel all the time.
I'm sure it can. But you don't have to explain yourself to anyone. You're allowed to enjoy the things you love, regardless of what other people think.
Thanks. I needed to hear that.
You're welcome. I'm always here to listen.
